Body:
"""test that the initial context counts
        as 'enclosing' scope, for plain defs"""
t = Template(
    """

        <%def name="a()">
            a: x is ${x}
        </%def>

        <%def name="b()">
            <%
                x = 10
            %>
            b. x is ${x}.  ${a()}
        </%def>

        ${b()}
    """
    )
eq_(flatten_result(t.render(x=5)), 'b. x is 10. a: x is 5')
